parameter.name: CMSConnectionString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: CMSConnectionString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=kentico1.database.windows.net;Initial Catalog=kentico;Integrated Security=False;Persist Security Info=False;User ID=ssaadmin;Password=Ssa#kentico;Connect Timeout=60;Encrypt=False;Current Language=English;
